scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary seated on a golden, stepped platform, holding the Christ Child. She is dressed in a blue robe and wears a golden halo. The Christ Child, also with a golden halo, is held in her arms. Mary is shown holding a white rose, a symbol of purity. To the left, an angel kneels, playing a harp. The angel is dressed in white and has golden wings. The background features a red tapestry with gold ornamentation and a blue curtain. The figures are situated on a green, grassy ground with scattered flowers. The overall scene is framed by an illuminated border with floral motifs.
